column4: Ok, so I upgraded to 9.04, but ati and ubuntu screwed my system, so I need to go back to 8.10 until the next ati driver realese. I have separate home main partitons, all I need to do is install 8.10 on the main partiton and all my data will be left alone right?
is there an easier way where I won't have to reinstall my programs?
